mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_VERIFY, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_REGDATE, MEMBER_ENABLED) VALUES (MEMBER_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEMBER_VERIFY}, #{MEMBER_EMAIL}, #{MEMBER_NAME}, #{MEMBER_NICKNAME}, #{MEMBER_GENDER}, SYSDATE, 'Y')
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERPROFILE SET MPROFILE_INTRODUCE = #{MPROFILE_INTRODUCE}, MPROFILE_LATITUDE = #{MPROFILE_LATITUDE}, MPROFILE_LONGITUDE = #{MPROFILE_LONGITUDE}, MPROFILE_IMG_NAME = #{MPROFILE_IMG_NAME}, MPROFILE_IMG_SERVERNAME = #{MPROFILE_IMG_SERVERNAME}, MPROFILE_IMG_PATH = #{MPROFILE_IMG_PATH} WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{MEMBER_CODE}
